capstone.gui.utils

Class ListenerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • capstone.gui.utils.ListenerFactory

  • public class ListenerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory object that creates objects that implement EventListener for the various components of the graphical user interface.
    See Also:
    EventListener

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ListenerFactory()

      static java.awt.event.ActionListener getRandomizeListener(SequencerDisplay parent, NoteCollection notes)
      Creates the action listener that makes a call to our randomizer MIPS program through Mars++ and then makes calls responsible for loading the data of the generated sequence into the GUI o display.

      • getTimeSignatureSelectListener

        public static java.awt.event.ActionListener getTimeSignatureSelectListener(SequencerDisplay parent,
                                                                           Labels labels,
                                                                           NoteCollection notes,
                                                                           javax.swing.JButton currentButton,
                                                                           javax.swing.JPanel center)
        Creates the ActionListener that brings up a window to select a new time signature.
        Parameters:
        parent - the sequencer display
        labels - the container that stores the sequencer labels
        notes - the notes that the user has entered
        currentButton - the currently selected button
        center - the panel containing the note button objects
        Returns:
        the created time signature selection action listener
        See Also:
        ActionListener

      • getFlatListener

        public static java.awt.event.ActionListener getFlatListener(Labels labels,
                                                            java.awt.Component[] components,
                                                            NoteCollection notes,
                                                            NoteButton currentButton)
        Creates an ActionListener that will change how notes are displayed, from sharps to flats and vice versa.
        Parameters:
        labels - the object containing the display's notes
        components - the components contained in the center panel (all NoteButtons)
        notes - the notes that the user has entered
        currentButton - the currently selected button
        Returns:
        the created ActionListener that changes between flats and sharps
        See Also:
        ActionListener
